title: Imposition of Restrictions (Coronavirus Disease (COVID-19) Pandemic) (No. 4) Instrument, 2020

provisions.title: Extension of restrictions
provisions.content: With effect from Monday, 13th April, 2020, there shall be an extension of the restrictions imposed on public gatherings pursuant to paragraph 1 of the Imposition of Restrictions (Coronavirus Disease (COVID-19) Pandemic) Instrument, 2020 (E.I. 64) for a further period of two weeks; and public gatherings pursuant to paragraph 1 of the Imposition of Restrictions (Coronavirus Disease (COVID-19) Pandemic) Instrument, 2020 (E.I. 64) for a further period of two weeks; and the movement outside the place of abode of persons resident within the areas specified in the First Schedule of the Imposition of Restrictions (Coronavirus Disease (COVID-19) Pandemic) (No. 2) Instrument, 2020 (E.I. 65) for a further period of one week. the movement outside the place of abode of persons resident within the areas specified in the First Schedule of the Imposition of Restrictions (Coronavirus Disease (COVID-19) Pandemic) (No. 2) Instrument, 2020 (E.I. 65) for a further period of one week.

provisions.title: Review of restrictions
provisions.content: Where the exigencies of the situation require, the duration of the restrictions specified under paragraph 1 may be varied in accordance with subsection (2) of section 4 of the Imposition of Restrictions Act, 2020 (Act 1012). Where the exigencies of the situation require, the duration of the restrictions specified under paragraph 1 may be varied in accordance with subsection (2) of section 4 of the Imposition of Restrictions Act, 2020 (Act 1012).

provisions.title: Savings
provisions.content: This Instrument is without prejudice to the application of the Imposition of Restrictions (Coronavirus Disease (COVID-19) Pandemic) Instrument, 2020 (E.I. 64) and the Imposition of Restrictions (Coronavirus Disease (COVID-19) Pandemic) (No. 2) Instrument, 2020 (E.I. 65), whose provisions shall otherwise continue in full force and effect.Nana Addo Dankwa Afuko-AddoPresident of the Republic of Ghana This Instrument is without prejudice to the application of the Imposition of Restrictions (Coronavirus Disease (COVID-19) Pandemic) Instrument, 2020 (E.I. 64) and the Imposition of Restrictions (Coronavirus Disease (COVID-19) Pandemic) (No. 2) Instrument, 2020 (E.I. 65), whose provisions shall otherwise continue in full force and effect.
